alert.note: Alert for Wyoming Black Hills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 5:27PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Crook County through 600 PM MDT... At 527 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Cook Lake, or 14 miles north of Sundance, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Aladdin, Bear Lodge Campground and Cook Lake. This includes Interstate 90 in Wyoming between Mile Markers 195 and 200. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for northeastern Wyoming.
